name: Copilot
description: Copilot utilizes the Microsoft Prometheus model, built upon OpenAI's GPT-4 foundational large language model, which in turn has been fine-tuned using both supervised and reinforcement learning techniques.

name: GPT-4
description: OpenAI's most advanced text model with broad capabilities including complex reasoning, creative content generation, and code writing. Known for its ability to handle nuanced prompts and maintain coherence over long conversations.

name: Claude 3 Opus
description: Most capable Claude 3 model for highly complex tasks, excelling in ethical reasoning, safety-first design, and interpreting ambiguous instructions with human-like nuance.

name: Gemini 1.5
description: Google's most advanced multimodal model that can process text, images, audio, and video. Features exceptional cross-modal reasoning and integration with Google’s ecosystem for real-time data access.

name: Llama 3
description: Meta's open-source large language model with strong performance across benchmarks. Optimized for research flexibility and fine-tuning, with a focus on efficient inference on consumer hardware.

name: Stable Diffusion XL
description: Stability AI's flagship image model capable of generating high-quality 1024x1024 images. Renowned for its community-driven fine-tuning and extensive pre-trained variants.

name: Midjourney
description: Specialized in artistic and creative image generation with a distinctive style. Known for its community-driven development and focus on photorealistic and surreal outputs.

name: GPT-4 Turbo
description: Optimized version of GPT-4 with lower costs and improved performance. Excels in rapid response times and handling high-volume API requests.

name: Mixtral
description: Sparse mixture of experts model that outperforms larger dense models. Unique for its dynamic routing of tasks to specialized sub-networks, enhancing efficiency.

name: Stable Diffusion 3
description: Next generation of Stable Diffusion with improved prompt understanding. Features enhanced coherence in complex scenes and faster generation speeds.

name: Grok 3
description: xAI's latest conversational AI designed to provide maximally helpful and truthful answers. Unique for its focus on accelerating human scientific discovery and real-time data integration.

name: Mistral Large
description: Mistral AI's flagship large-scale model, competing with top-tier proprietary models. Known for its multilingual proficiency and enterprise-grade security features.

name: Llama 3.1
description: Updated iteration of Llama 3 with improved efficiency and context handling. Features enhanced fine-tuning support for domain-specific applications.

name: Claude 3.5 Sonnet
description: Mid-tier update to Claude 3, balancing cost and capability. Improved in reasoning under uncertainty and handling edge-case prompts.

name: Gemma
description: Google’s lightweight open-source model family, designed for efficiency and accessibility. Optimized for on-device deployment and low-resource environments.

name: Aurora
description: xAI’s multimodal model integrating text, vision, and code generation. Tailored for scientific visualization and real-time problem-solving.

name: Stable Diffusion 3.5
description: Latest Stable Diffusion iteration with superior detail and prompt fidelity. Includes built-in upscaling and real-time preview capabilities.

name: Phi-3
description: Microsoft’s next-gen small-scale model with exceptional reasoning for its size. Designed for edge computing and low-latency applications.

name: CodeLlama 2
description: Updated CodeLlama with improved multi-language support and debugging capabilities. Excels in generating production-ready code snippets.

name: Qwen 2
description: Alibaba’s advanced multilingual model with strong performance in Chinese and English. Features optimized tokenization for cross-lingual tasks.

name: Mistral Medium
description: Mid-tier Mistral model bridging efficiency and power. Features robust privacy controls for enterprise deployment.

name: Gemini Ultra
description: Top-tier Gemini model with unparalleled multimodal integration. Excels in real-time processing of live video and audio streams.

name: LLaVA 2
description: Enhanced vision-language assistant with improved grounding and object recognition. Ideal for open-source multimodal research.

name: Nous-Capybara
description: Nous Research’s latest chat model with a focus on conversational depth and humor. Fine-tuned on diverse, high-quality datasets.
